attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This website promotes blasphemy, ignores respect and will incite hatred amongst the Muslim people. Most of all it disrespects our beloved prophet (saw) of which his name i cannot mention out of respect in the context of this petition. ON THE DAY OF JUDGMENT ALLAH TALLAH  WILL ASK YOU WHEN THEY WERE MOCKING MY CREATION , WHEN THEY WERE MAKING FUN OF MY BELOVED RELIGION AND ITS PEOPLE
WHAT DID YOU DO

rejection.details:
Please visit Ofcom: www.ofcom.org.uk/complain

Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
